import React from "react" import memesData from "./memesData" export default function Main() { let [randomImg, setRandomImg] = React.useState() let button = () => { let meme = memesData.data.memes let randomNumber = Math.floor(Math.random(meme) * meme.length) let randomMeme = meme[randomNumber].url setRandomImg(prevRandomImg => randomMeme) } return (
) }
